author: Divya Kala Bhavani
title: PlayStation gamers can now acquire Uncharted games for free
description: This move is part of PlayStation’s Play At Home initiative which aims to keep gamers — rookie and expert — at home during the COVID-19 lockdowns and quarantines.
content: The gaming industry has observed a turbulent 2020 so far, with a lot of difficulty coming post-coronavirus outbreak around the world. According to a June 2019 insights report by analysis firm Newzoo, it was hypothesised that the global gaming industry would h… [+3558 chars]
